dr.app.beagle.tools
Class CompleteHistorySimulator

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.sequence.Sequences
      dr.evolution.alignment.SimpleAlignment
          dr.app.beagle.tools.CompleteHistorySimulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Alignment, PatternList, SiteList, SequenceList, TreeTraitProvider, TaxonList, MarkovJumpsRegisterAcceptor, Attributable, Identifiable, XHTMLable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
public class CompleteHistorySimulator
extends SimpleAlignment
implements MarkovJumpsRegisterAcceptor, TreeTraitProvider

Simulates a complete transition history and alignment of sequences given a tree, substitution model and branch rate model. This code duplicates portions of dr.app.seqgen.SequenceSimulator. However, SequenceSimulator is wed to dr.evomodel.substmodel.SubstitutionModel which does not emit the infinitesimal generator.

Author:
Marc A. Suchard, remco@cs.waikato.ac.nz
See Also:
Serialized Form
